author: andschwa
body:
Replaces #1229.

I see what happened in your branch @JamesWTruher, and I think this is all you were trying to merge, so I cherry-picked it.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Travis is having some serious problems. One of the Linux builds passed, and the prior PR passed. Using @vors sign-off and my own, merging.

title: Restructure of Pester test layout
